title: any tips for ignoring toxic people/bullies
body: i just wanna know so i don't get too upset when there's a toxic person in chat

replies.body:
Hey there,

The best way to ignore the problem of a toxic player in your game would be to mute them, this can be accomplished from the scoreboard by clicking the mute button on the player who is being toxic.

You should also remember to report the player in the post-game lobby.
